scripts.install-all: cd frontend && bun install --save-text-lockfile && cd ../backend && bun install
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && bun run lint
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../backend && bun test
scripts.verify: npm run verify:backend && npm run verify:frontend && npm run verify:docs
scripts.verify:backend: cd backend && bun run lint && bun run test
scripts.verify:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint && npm test && npm run e2e:ci && npm run e2e:fullstack:ci
scripts.build:prod: cd frontend && bun run clean && bun run build && bun run compress && cd ../backend && bun run build
scripts.deploy:cloudflare: npm run build:prod && cd frontend && wrangler pages deploy dist/browser --project-name inkweld-frontend && cd ../backend && wrangler deploy
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && bun run dev" "cd frontend && bun run start"
